chapters.title: Chapter 31: The Far Snows
chapters.info: Bar Dowtry, p. 514 (364)—A young man from Emond's Field. He and Kimry Lewin were caught by Nynaeve in his father's hayloft doing something they shouldn't be doing before they were married. Kimry was 21 years old at the time; her mother was not pleased, and neither Kimry nor Bar could sit for their first week of marriage. The Women's Circle decided that a month was the shortest possible period of engagement, and the two barely got by a few minutes without another strapping of some kind until the month was up.
